name: Slime Escape (CaTBoNe Games)
description:
A slime is tired of living in a dungeon. It's time to escape! When a slime obtained ivory or banana, a mutation is triggered. It acquires the strong pushing force of the elephants and the smartness of the monkeys to grab and throw the stones. Making use of the newly acquired abilities, the slime is going to find the way out!

Controls:

Walk - Arrow keys
Jump - SPACE
Throw - X then SPACE, aim with left/ right key
Push - X + left/ right key
Reset - R
Navigate in menus - up/down key
Confirm options in menus - SPACE
Pause - Esc/ P

The team:

This work is submitted as a project for the DISCORD JAM #5, a 48-hour jam, under the theme 'mutation' which is a collaborative work of:
Programming - Hardwin Bui
Game Design - Hardwin Bui and Margaret Wong
Level Design - Hardwin Bui and Margaret Wong
Graphic Design - Margaret Wong
Sound Design - Trufata
